package.name: Encodings
package.description: Implementation of encoding to convert bytes to characters and vice versa

class.name: Ascii
class.description: American Standard Code for Information Interchange

class.name: Base64
class.description: Radix-64 ASCII representation for binary data

class.name: Utf8
class.description: UCS Transformation Format to 8 bit words

class.name: Utf16
class.description: UCS Transformation Format to 16 bit words

class.name: Utf32
class.description: UCS Transformation Format to 32 bit words
